meanings.sent1: After the play, the actors exeunt the stage.
meanings.sent2: The guests exeunt the party when it gets late.
meanings.sent3: The students exeunt the classroom eagerly when the bell rings.
meanings.sent4: As the sun sets, the birds exeunt the sky, heading to their nests.
meanings.sent5: In the evening, the workers exeunt the factory, ready to go home.

meanings.sent1: The characters exeunt the scene, making way for the next ones.
meanings.sent2: When the show ends, the audience exeunt the theater.
meanings.sent3: The cats exeunt the garden, leaving the birds in peace.
meanings.sent4: As winter approaches, the geese exeunt the lake, flying south.
meanings.sent5: After the meeting, the team members exeunt the office, each going their own way.
